text: Yuval Levin is an Israeli American journalist and conservative political commentator who is the editor of National Affairs. ==Early life and education== Yuval Levin was born in Haifa in 1977. In 1985, he and his family moved to the United States of America. He studied political science at American University and got his Phd at the University of Chicago. ==Books== *The Tyranny of Reason (2001) *Imagining the Future (2008) *Room to Grow (with Ramesh Ponnuru) (2014) *The Great Debate: Edmund Burke, Thomas Paine and the birth of Right and Left (2014) *The Fractured Republic (2016) *A Time to Build (2020) Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:American political commentators
title: Yuval Levin
